## test-equivalence-matchers package

The core ContractCase TestEquivalenceMatchers.

## Remarks

Use these to generalise your tests, avoiding the need to depend on specific data during verification. It's not about defining the whole type system, the idea is that you are saying "any message that matches this Test Equivalence Matcher is considered covered by this test".

For more information, see [the documentation here](https://case.contract-testing.io/docs/defining-contracts/relaxing-tests)

| Type Alias                                                          | Description                                                     |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [AnyMatcherOrData](./test-equivalence-matchers.anymatcherordata.md) | Represents any matcher, or any json data                        |
